title: Mobile Learning-Based Medical Science Leadership Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic concepts of medical device operation
context.additional_context: Development of practical competencies using medical scientific equipment in a mobile environment for healthcare organization managers/leaders.

learning_goals: Learners can demonstrate medical device operation procedures with 90% accuracy in a mobile learning environment.
Learners can apply equipment troubleshooting strategies in mobile learning with 80% or higher effectiveness through case analysis by situation.
Learners can reduce practical performance errors by 70% using an avatar feedback system.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
